name: Classic Leather Oxford
description: Elegant men's dress shoe made from 100% full-grain leather. Features a stacked heel and breathable lining. Perfect for formal occasions.

description: Stylish and versatile boots with elastic side panels and a pull tab. Soft suede finish. Ideal with jeans or trousers.

name: Performance Running Shoes
description: Lightweight athletic shoes with responsive cushioning and a breathable mesh upper. Designed for high-mileage runs.

description: Casual every-day sneakers with a durable canvas upper and a vulcanized rubber sole. Available in multiple colors.

name: Waterproof Hiking Boots
description: Heavy-duty boots with a Vibram sole and Gore-Tex lining. Provides excellent ankle support and grip on uneven terrain.

name: Leather Loafers
description: Slip-on loafers with a sophisticated buckle detail. Made from polished leather. Great for business-casual wear.

name: Memory Foam Work Boots
description: Safety boots with a steel toe and oil-resistant outsole. Memory foam insole for all-day comfort on the job.

name: Minimalist Training Shoes
description: Low-profile gym shoes for lifting and cross-training. Provides a stable base and excellent ground feel.

name: Luxury Italian Sneakers

name: Combat Style Boots
